name: A set of crystals Wunderwaffe
detailed_description:
Adds sets of crystals to the game
7500 purple crystals
1500 red crystals

With these crystals you will be able to play comfortably at the very beginning of the game. You can buy a good tank and improve the in-game store.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 500MB
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
